thread.title: Xunlei - Launched Thunderchain, A Blockchain Platform Which Can Concurrently Conduct Millions Of Transactions Per Second

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Xunlei - Launched Thunderchain, A Blockchain Platform Which Can Concurrently Conduct Millions Of Transactions Per Second

organizations.name: blockchain platform which can concurrently conduct millions of transactions per second  xunlei ltd

text:
April 20, 2018 / 11:33 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Xunlei - Launched Thunderchain, A Blockchain Platform Which Can Concurrently Conduct Millions Of Transactions Per Second Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Xunlei Ltd: 
* XUNLEI - LAUNCHED THUNDERCHAIN, A BLOCKCHAIN PLATFORM WHICH CAN CONCURRENTLY CONDUCT MILLIONS OF TRANSACTIONS PER SECOND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
